titleStmt.title: The catalogue of all the discourses published against popery, during the reign of King James II by the members of the Church of England, and by the non-conformists with the names of the authors of them.
titleStmt.author: Gee, Edward, 1657-1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,
